CODIF_DATA.AA_AUTHORITY_TYPE: Ministry or any other national or federal authority
CODIF_DATA.RP_REGULATION: European Economic Area (EEA), with participation by GPA countries
CODIF_DATA.HEADING: 03B02

TI_TEXT.P: Оборудване за лица с физически увреждания
Εξοπλισμός για άτομα με ειδικές ανάγκες

TITLE.P: 17/621 Hygiene aids

SHORT_DESCR.P: According to the National Insurance Act chapter 10, all those who have had their functional ability in everyday life significantly and permanently reduced due to illness, injury or defect, have a right to necessary and appropriate aids. The purpose of the procurement is:
— To establish an assortmet of hygiene aids, with a breadth that covers the majority of the needs of actual users.
— To have a system so that the products can be designed, assembled, disassembled, repaired and reused.

TITLE.P: Item 1 Commode

SHORT_DESCR.P: The users are, amongst others, persons.
— who have reduced or no walking function,
— who need to go to the toilet in other places than the bathroom.

RENEWAL_DESCR.P: The contracting authority has an option for an extension(s) for all or parts of the contract for a period of up to 2 years.

OPTIONS_DESCR.P: The contracting authority has an option for an extension(s) for all or parts of the contract for a period of up to 2 years.

TITLE.P: Item 2: Shower stool and commode

SHORT_DESCR.P: The users are, amongst others, persons.
— who have reduced or no walking function,
— who have a need to sit whilst showering,
— who can need to be moved with the help of the shower stool and commode,
— who can need to use the shower stool and commode over the toilet.

RENEWAL_DESCR.P: The contracting authority has an option for an extension(s) for all or parts of the contract for a period of up to 2 years.

OPTIONS_DESCR.P: The contracting authority has an option for an extension(s) for all or parts of the contract for a period of up to 2 years.

TITLE.P: Item 3: Shower stool and commode - high user weight

SHORT_DESCR.P: The users are, amongst others, persons.
— who have reduced or no walking function,
— who have a need to sit whilst showering,
— who can need to be moved with the help of the shower stool and commode,
— who can need to use the shower stool and commode over the toilet,
— who have a high body weight.

RENEWAL_DESCR.P: The contracting authority has an option for an extension(s) for all or parts of the contract for a period of up to 2 years.

OPTIONS_DESCR.P: The contracting authority has an option for an extension(s) for all or parts of the contract for a period of up to 2 years.

TITLE.P: Item 4: Shower stool and commode with manual tilt

SHORT_DESCR.P: The users are, amongst others, persons.
— who have reduced or no walking function and reduced stability in the upper body,
— who have a need to sit whilst showering,
— who need pressure relief on the sitting unit,
— who can need to be moved with the help of the shower stool and commode,
— who can need to use the shower stool and commode over the toilet.

RENEWAL_DESCR.P: The contracting authority has an option for an extension(s) for all or parts of the contract once or several times for a period of up to 2 years.

OPTIONS_DESCR.P: The contracting authority has an option for an extension(s) for all or parts of the contract once or several times for a period of up to 2 years.

TITLE.P: Item 5: Shower stool and commode with electrical tilt

SHORT_DESCR.P: The users are, amongst others, persons.
— who have reduced or no walking function and reduced stability in the upper body,
— who have a need to sit whilst showering,
— who are often nursed whilst on the shower stool and commode,
— who need a soft or cushioned seat,
— who can need to be moved with the help of the shower stool and commode,
— who can need to use the shower stool and commode over the toilet,
— who can have a high body weight.

RENEWAL_DESCR.P: The contracting authority has an option for an extension(s) for all or parts of the contract for a period of up to 2 years.

OPTIONS_DESCR.P: The contracting authority has an option for an extension(s) for all or parts of the contract for a period of up to 2 years.

TITLE.P: Item 6: Shower stool and commode with driving gear

SHORT_DESCR.P: The users are, amongst others, persons.
— who drive the shower stool and commode themselves,
— who need to move easily with the shower stool and commode,
— who can need to use the shower stool and commode over the toilet,
— who have reduced or no walking function.

RENEWAL_DESCR.P: The contracting authority has an option for an extension(s) for all or parts of the contract once or several times for a period of up to 2 years.

OPTIONS_DESCR.P: The contracting authority has an option for an extension(s) for all or parts of the contract for a period of up to 2 years.

TITLE.P: Item 7: Shower stool and commode with a tilt for children/youths

SHORT_DESCR.P: The users are, amongst others.
— children and youths,
— persons who need to move easily with the shower stool and commode,
— persons with reduced or no walking function,
— persons who have very reduced sitting stability,
— persons who need a shower stool and commode with positioning support,
— persons who need to use the shower stool and commode over the toilet.

RENEWAL_DESCR.P: The contracting authority has an option for an extension(s) for all or parts of the contract for a period of up to 2 years.

OPTIONS_DESCR.P: The contracting authority has an option for an extension(s) for all or parts of the contract for a period of up to 2 years.

TITLE.P: Item 8: Shower stool - round

SHORT_DESCR.P: The users are, amongst others, persons.
— who have a need to sit whilst showering.

RENEWAL_DESCR.P: The contracting authority has an option for an extension(s) for all or parts of the contract for a period of up to 2 years.

OPTIONS_DESCR.P: The contracting authority has an option for an extension(s) for all or parts of the contract for a period of up to 2 years.

TITLE.P: Item 9: Shower stool - with corners

SHORT_DESCR.P: The users are, amongst others, persons.
— who have a need to sit whilst showering.

RENEWAL_DESCR.P: The contracting authority has an option for an extension(s) for all or parts of the contract for a period of up to 2 years.

OPTIONS_DESCR.P: The contracting authority has an option for an extension(s) for all or parts of the contract for a period of up to 2 years.

TITLE.P: Item 10: Shower stool - square

SHORT_DESCR.P: ) The users are, amongst others, persons.
— who have a need to sit whilst showering,
— who need support whilst showering.

RENEWAL_DESCR.P: The contracting authority has an option for an extension(s) for all or parts of the contract for a period of up to 2 years.

OPTIONS_DESCR.P: The contracting authority has an option for an extension(s) for all or parts of the contract for a period of up to 2 years.

TITLE.P: Item 11: Shower stool - square - high user weight

SHORT_DESCR.P: The users are, amongst others, persons.
— who have a need to sit whilst showering,
— who need support whilst showering,
— who have a high user weight.

RENEWAL_DESCR.P: The contracting authority has an option for an extension(s) for all or parts of the contract for a period of up to 2 years.

OPTIONS_DESCR.P: The contracting authority has an option for an extension(s) for all or parts of the contract for a period of up to 2 years.

TITLE.P: Item 12: Bath stool

SHORT_DESCR.P: The users are, amongst others, children/youths.
— who need extra support whilst bathing in baths,
— who have reduced sitting stability,
— who vary between sitting and lying in the bath.

RENEWAL_DESCR.P: The contracting authority has an option for an extension(s) for all or parts of the contract for a period of up to 2 years.

OPTIONS_DESCR.P: The contracting authority has an option for an extension(s) for all or parts of the contract for a period of up to 2 years.

TITLE.P: Item 13: Bath seat

SHORT_DESCR.P: The users are, amongst others, persons.
— who need support whilst in the bath,
— who need an easy way to get in and out of the bath.

RENEWAL_DESCR.P: The contracting authority has an option for an extension(s) for all or parts of the contract for a period of up to 2 years.

OPTIONS_DESCR.P: The contracting authority has an option for an extension(s) for all or parts of the contract for a period of up to 2 years.

TITLE.P: Item 14: Bath board

SHORT_DESCR.P: The users are, amongst others, persons.
— who need to sit high in the bath.

RENEWAL_DESCR.P: The contracting authority has an option for an extension(s) for all or parts of the contract for a period of up to 2 years.

OPTIONS_DESCR.P: The contracting authority has an option for an extension(s) for all or parts of the contract for a period of up to 2 years.

TITLE.P: Item 15: Bathinette - freestanding with electric height regulation

SHORT_DESCR.P: The users are, amongst others, persons.
— who need to be cared for on a bathinette,
— who are older than the normal bathinette age,
— who are a carer and need an adapted work position,
— who need to use a bathinette in combination with a person lift.

RENEWAL_DESCR.P: The contracting authority has an option for an extension(s) for all or parts of the contract for a period of up to 2 years.

OPTIONS_DESCR.P: The contracting authority has an option for an extension(s) for all or parts of the contract for a period of up to 2 years.

SHORT_DESCR.P: The users are, amongst others, persons.

— who are older than the normal bathinette age,
— who are a carer and need an adapted work position,
— who need to use a bathinette in combination with a person lift.

RENEWAL_DESCR.P: The contracting authority has an option for an extension(s) for all or parts of the contract for a period of up to 2 years.

OPTIONS_DESCR.P: The contracting authority has an option for an extension(s) for all or parts of the contract for a period of up to 2 years.

TITLE.P: Item 17: Shower trolley - with electric height regulation and tilt

SHORT_DESCR.P: The users are, amongst others, persons.
— who need to be cared for on a bathinette,
— who are older than the normal bathinette age,
— who are a carer and need an adapted work position,
— who need to use a bathinette in combination with a person lift.

OPTIONS_DESCR.P: The contracting authority has an option for an extension(s) for all or parts of the contract for a period of up to 2 years.

TITLE.P: Item 18: Bath - with electric height regulation

SHORT_DESCR.P: The users are, amongst others, persons.
— who need to be bathed and nursed in the bath.

RENEWAL_DESCR.P: The contracting authority has an option for an extension(s) for all or parts of the contract for a period of up to 2 years.

OPTIONS_DESCR.P: The contracting authority has an option for an extension(s) for all or parts of the contract for a period of up to 2 years.

TITLE.P: Item 19: Toilet - unisex with inbuilt shower and air dryer, wall mounted

SHORT_DESCR.P: The users are, amongst others, persons.
— who need help with intimate hygiene,
— with reduced arm function/hand function,
— who need simple controls.

RENEWAL_DESCR.P: The contracting authority has an option for an extension(s) for all or parts of the contract for a period of up to 2 years.

OPTIONS_DESCR.P: The contracting authority has an option for an extension(s) for all or parts of the contract for a period of up to 2 years.

SHORT_DESCR.P: The users are, amongst others, persons.
— who need help with intimate hygiene,
— who have reduced arm function/hand function,
— who need simple controls,
— who have an existing toilet with an inbuilt cistern.

RENEWAL_DESCR.P: The contracting authority has an option for an extension(s) for all or parts of the contract for a period of up to 2 years.

OPTIONS_DESCR.P: The contracting authority has an option for an extension(s) for all or parts of the contract for a period of up to 2 years.

SHORT_DESCR.P: The users are, amongst others, persons.
— who need help getting up from the toilet.

OPTIONS_DESCR.P: The contracting authority has an option for an extension(s) for all or parts of the contract for a period of up to 2 years.

SHORT_DESCR.P: The users are, amongst others, persons.
— who need help getting up from the toilet.

SHORT_DESCR.P: The users are, amongst others, persons.

SHORT_DESCR.P: The users are, amongst others, persons.
— who need support when standing up from the toilet,
— who need a higher toilet seat,
— who live in a household with other persons.

RENEWAL_DESCR.P: The contracting authority has an option for an extension(s) for all or parts of the contract for a period of up to 2 years.

OPTIONS_DESCR.P: The contracting authority has an option for an extension(s) for all or parts of the contract for a period of up to 2 years.

SHORT_DESCR.P: The users are, amongst others, persons.

RENEWAL_DESCR.P: The contracting authority has an option for an extension(s) for all or parts of the contract for a period of up to 2 years.

TITLE.P: Item 29: Toilet arm supports - for mounting on the toilet

SHORT_DESCR.P: The users are, amongst others, persons.
— who need support when standing up from the toilet.

OPTIONS_DESCR.P: The contracting authority has an option for an extension(s) for all or parts of the contract for a period of up to 2 years.

TITLE.P: Item 31: Support pole

SHORT_DESCR.P: The users are, amongst others, persons.
— who need support when getting up, for example, from bed and armchairs.

RENEWAL_DESCR.P: The contracting authority has an option for an extension(s) for all or parts of the contract for a period of up to 2 years.

SUITABILITY.P: — Norwegian tenderers: Tax and VAT certificate from the tax authorities, not older than 6 months from the tender deadline expiry.

INFO_ADD.P: Tore Høiland and Marit Bakken Ulsberg.
